price: 1. Qaranwal tanim kee baaxô bagul tanim inkih Yalla saytunnossah, Usuk amoytay ginó inkih yamlike kinni, usuk kulli boolak saytunih, usuk isi reedal mayso li, isi abtol naggaara.
arabic: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلۡمَلِكِ ٱلۡقُدُّوسِ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yusabbiḥu lillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi al-maliki al-qudūsi al-ʿazīzi al-ḥakīmi
